title: Version 123.0.2420.65: March 27, 2024
text:
Version 123.0.2420.65: March 27, 2024 
Version 123.0.2420.65: March 27, 2024 
Fixed various bugs and performance issues, includes security fixes, and improves reliability. 
Stable channel security updates are listed  
here 
. 
Improved reliability 
Fixed a browser crash that occurred when the  
UserDataDir 
 policy is used to specify a path on a network share. Note that using a network share location for the user data directory is generally unsupported.
